title: Full-Stack Web Development
desc: I can develop a fully fledged website, handling the client side, and server side. This includes creating the UI/UX and coding the design, designing and creating the database and necessary APIs. If you do not know what any of this means, don't worry I will handle it for you!

title: eCommerce webApps
desc: As more and more consumers transfer their shopping habits to the digital realm, companies continue to put their efforts into developing attractive and engaging ecommerce sites that drive conversions. Do not let them beat you into it. And let's create and/or utilize all the essential tools for your business to grow!

title: Support & Maintenance
desc: Wasted time is a wasted money, never leave your website down or faulty, customers might come anytime and you need to be able to be there for them. let's keep your website maintened!
